name: lottery
description: Lottery contract with VRF2 . Contract use VRFv2 for generating random numbers. Therefore, for the correct operation of the contract, it is necessary to create subscription on > https://vrf.chain.link/rinkeby for Rinkeby testnet and https://vrf.chain.link/mainnet for mainnet, replenish the balance of LINK and add contract address as a consumer
author: Ivan Lieskov

scripts.verifyRinkebyLOT: npx hardhat verify --network rinkeby --contract contracts/Token.sol:LOTcoin [Token.sol address]
scripts.verifyRinkebyLottery: npx hardhat verify --network rinkeby --contract contracts/Lottery.sol:Lottery --constructor-args helpers/arguments.js [Lottery.sol address]
scripts.verifyLOT: npx hardhat verify --network ethereum --contract contracts/Token.sol:LOTcoin [Token.sol address]
scripts.verifyLottery: npx hardhat verify --network ethereum --contract contracts/Lottery.sol:Lottery --constructor-args helpers/arguments.js [Lottery.sol address]
